subject: Re: Unusual email activity from your site : smartlivinghg.com.au (Email disabled)
preview: This message was sent to the following 6 people: WP Perk Support Team, Joel Maligalig, Glen Jose Tenorio, Jaime Velasquez, Manuel Manceli, Rica V. Replying to this email will notify them.      Alright

full_threads.body:
This message was sent to the following 6 people: WP Perk Support Team, Joel Maligalig, Glen Jose Tenorio, Jaime Velasquez, Manuel Manceli, Rica V. Replying to this email will notify them.

Alright, deleting now, 63158 emails in the queue.
Farhan from Kinsta
On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:45 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Ok, we have now added recaptcha to the check out form. Can you please clear the email log and reactivate them please>

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:31 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Thanks

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:31 PM, "Farhan Faisal" <farhan.faisal@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Quick way would be with wp-cli, but I personally do not have experience doing that for WooCommerce orders.

Read here:

https://wordpress.org/support/topic/tip-how-to-delete-all-your-orders-and-save-you-time/

https://gist.github.com/lukecav/85722dd659c3d70d4bb6cb9fed5cbb31

Make sure you make backups first

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:27 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Thanks Farhan. Also, do you have a quick way to delete the failed orders/

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:26 PM, "Farhan Faisal" <farhan.faisal@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi,

Thank you for taking actions on this.

I think this is the best way, and it is available in the Pro version : https://wordpress.org/plugins/google-captcha/#description

You can configure captcha on WordPress native module such as comments too, on top of WooCommerce site. Besides, you can use reCaptcha v3.

Regards

Farhan Faisal

Malware & Abuse Engineer | Kinsta

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:23 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

There are more than 30,000 failed orders.

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 02:22 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Farhan, I'm working on this now. Do you know the best way to stop these bots trying to performance transactions with WooCommerce?

On Wed, Oct 5, 2022 at 11:34 AM, "Farhan Faisal" <farhan.faisal@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi WP Perk team,

This is the 3rd and final notification regarding the outbound email suspension on your website smartlivinghg.com.au (fonahefo). We initially reached out on Oct 3, 2022, though we have not yet received feedback from you regarding this topic.
﻿
﻿﻿Please be aware that if we do not hear from you, the outbound email notifications service could remain suspended indefinitely. You can always respond to this message at any time, though we will no longer be sending notifications that the email service is stopped.

If you have questions, don't hesitate to reach out and we can help find a suitable solution or advise on any issues.


﻿We look forward to your feedback!
﻿

Thanks,


﻿Farhan | Malware & Abuse Engineer

Kinsta

On Tue, Oct 4, 2022 at 11:01 AM, "Farhan Faisal" <farhan.faisal@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi WP Perk team,

This is a follow-up to our original communication regarding the outbound email notifications from your website smartlivinghg.com.au (fonahefo) being temporarily suspended. This was suspended due to WooCommerce abuse triggering high volume of emails, and most of them are marked as spam.
﻿
﻿Please note that as stated on our Transactional Email Policy, we reserve the right to temporarily disable any website outbound email notifications until the issue is resolved. We realize this is an inconvenience; however, due to the severity of the situation, you must take the steps previously outlined.

Automated activities by spam bots, or scammers on your site can be mitigated by configuring captcha, even on WooCommerce activities, on top of the usual web forms such as contact form, or comments. Please checkout our article here, https://kinsta.com/blog/wordpress-captcha/, and also a few plugins such as reCaptcha by BestWebSoft and Login no captcha reCAPTCHA to protect your forms, such as login, registration, and WooCommerce pages.


﻿If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out! We're happy to help you find a suitable solution or offer guidance on any issues.

It is important to note that if we do not hear back from you, the outbound email notifications service could remain suspended indefinitely.
﻿
﻿Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter, we look forward to your feedback.
﻿
﻿Farhan | Malware & Abuse Engineer

Kinsta

On Mon, Oct 3, 2022 at 01:11 PM, "Farhan Faisal" <farhan.faisal@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi WP Perk team,

We are reaching out to you today to let you know that we are detecting unusual email activity on your site, smartlivinghg.com.au (fonahefo). Your site appears to be having unusual spike of user registration, or WooCommerce orders that triggered as spam in our spam filter. This could be due to abusive nature of the activity, high volume of emails are sent from your site.

Subjects

Along with 10,847 more emails that are stucked in the queue

Right now, the email service is disabled on your site. No emails will be sent out.

Automated activities by spam bots, or scammers on your site can be mitigated by configuring captcha, even on WooCommerce activities, on top of the usual web forms such as contact form, or comments. Please checkout our article here, https://kinsta.com/blog/wordpress-captcha/, and also a few plugins such as reCaptcha by BestWebSoft and Login no captcha reCAPTCHA to protect your forms, such as login, registration, and WooCommerce pages.

Most contact form plugins offer captcha via their integration settings. Documentation for the most popular form plugins can be found below:

Contact Form 7 - Really Simple Captcha

Contact Form 7 - reCaptcha

Gravity Forms

Ninja Forms

Elementor

Divi

In most cases, we recommend setting up a separate/external SMTP relay service such as Mailgun, Sendgrid, or Mailjet to handle your outgoing email or switch to using a third-party email marketing platform. This would ensure the best possible deliverability of your outgoing email and ensure this action is not triggered on our platform.

You can learn more about both of these options in our article Email Marketing Software Recommendations (Why Not to Use Your Host): Email Marketing Software Recommendations (Why Not to Use Your Host)

Let us know if you have any questions. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Farhan Faisal | Malware & Abuse Engineer

Kinsta
